mapper.select: select * from traffic_user where user_name = #{name} and user_password = #{pass}
SELECT * FROM `traffic_illegal_info` WHERE number = #{number} and number_plate = #{numberPlate} and engine_number = #{engine} and mobile = #{mobile}
mapper.update: update traffic_illegal_info set status = '1' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM traffic_illegal_info WHERE plate_type = #{plateType} and number_plate = #{numberPlate} and engine_number like CONCAT('%',#{engineNumber},'%') and status = '0'
SELECT * FROM traffic_scrap_info WHERE plate_type = #{plateType} and number_plate = #{numberPlate} and engine_number like CONCAT('%',#{engineNumber},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO traffic_plate_info ( id, create_id, create_time, plate_number, car_brand, qualified_no, car_size, car_type ) VALUES ( uuid(),#{createId},now(),#{plateNumber},#{carBrand},#{qualifiedNo},#{carSize},#{carType})
mapper.select: select * from traffic_plate_info left join traffic_user on create_id = user_id ORDER BY create_time desc
SELECT * FROM `traffic_leave_message` left join traffic_user on create_id = user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO traffic_leave_message ( id,content, create_id, create_time) VALUES ( uuid(),#{content},#{createId},now())
